title: Judgement system
body:
Playing game with 3 friend. A random guy locked yasuo and calling mid when mid is already taken at last 10 sec. Then he goes top, the origin top going to support because he want to win.  Then that yasuo feed first blood before minion born. 5 mins later. he come to mid ask mid go top by say "Fu*k Off, go top." We cant really do anything with that yasuo he is feeding. and after 20 min we surrendered. He start swear to us. then every one in our team except him got reported and the origin mid lane are banned for 1 day. Good job Riot. Uninstall game already.

You are really disappointed us.

replies.body: it takes more then 1 report for a ban. just ignore the troll and report after

> > [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=x0To3QeT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-19T14:24:23.631+0000)
>
> it takes more then 1 report for a ban.

This right here. If the "original mid" got banned then it's obviously not the first time they got reported, and even though a few of the systems related to reports are automatic they rarely ban the wrong people. I think it's safe to say the "original mid" has been doing some sh!t in their games to get themselves banned, even if it didn't occur in this particular game (which I honestly doubt).
